# Preset variables:
library(dplyr)
X <- c(1,2,3)
cDF <- data.frame(A=c(1,2,3,4), B=c('a','b','c','d'), C=c(T,F,T,T))

# The code:
sum1 <- 10 + 9 + 8
v1 <- X + 10
what_is_pi <- function() {
pi
}
squared <- function(x) {
  t <- x^2
  return(t)
}
imperial_to_metric <- function(feet, inches) {
  total_inches <- feet * 12 + inches
  meters <- total_inches * 0.0254
  meters
}
df4 <- cDF %>%
  filter(C==TRUE) %>%
  select(A,C)
